    Docstrings
    DrawSimpleGraphs.DrawSimpleGraphs
    DrawSimpleGraphs.KnightTourDrawing — Function.

    KnightTourDrawing(r,c) illustrates a Knight's tour of an r-by-c chessboard returning true if the tour exists and false if not.

    SimpleDrawing.draw — Function.

    draw(G::SimpleGraph) draws G in its current embedding. (If G does not have an embedding, then it is given a circular embedding.)
